term.title: halonium ions
term.contains: bromonium ions, chloronium ions, iodonium ions

item.text: Ions of the form R2X+, where X is any halogen (X = Br+ , bromonium ions; X = Cl+, chloronium ions; X = F+, fluoronium ions; X = I+, iodonium ions). They may be open-chain or cyclic. [image: Not defined]
